courses.name: Listening and Speaking with Deaf and Hard of Hearing Learners
courses.desc:
Prepares teachers in the oral/aural stream of the Deaf/Hard of Hearing Program to assess, teach and evaluate progress in the development of listening and speech skills of deaf/hard of hearing learners.

NOTE: Courses in this program are part of a professional post-graduate diploma program, and are not open for registration to students outside the program. Courses are not open for auditing.
